resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106168</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106168</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206293</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Chihuahuan Desert Lab On-Line Manual</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Chihuahuan Wüste Laboronline Handbuch</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">De Chihuahuan de Désert de Laboratoire Le Manuel 
En ligne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">De Chihuahuan Do Deserto Do Laboratório O Manual 
Em linha</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Di Chihuahuan Del Deserto Del Laboratorio Il 
Manuale In linea</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το εγχειρίδιο εργαστηρίων ερήμων Chihuahuan 
on-line</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">De Chihuahuan Del Desierto Del Laboratorio El 
Manual En línea</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">is a comprehensive program designed to enhance high school science, math and technology studies by involving students in monitoring natural resources in Carlsbad Caverns and Guadalupe Mountains National Parks. It offers a resource-based curriculum, science projects, an online manual for teachers, and an evaluation.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ist ein komplettes Programm, das konzipiert ist, 
um High School Wissenschaft zu erhöhen, studiert Mathe und 
Technologie, indem sie Kursteilnehmer mit einbeziehen, wenn sie 
Naturresourcen in den Carlsbad Höhle-und Guadalupe 
Gebirgsnationalparks überwachen. Es bietet einen Hilfsmittel 
gegründeten Lehrplan, Wissenschaft Projekte, ein Onlinehandbuch für 
Lehrer und eine Auswertung an.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">est un programme complet conçu pour mettre en 
valeur la science de lycée, les maths et la technologie étudient en 
faisant participer des étudiants en surveillant les ressources 
naturelles en parcs nationaux de cavernes de Carlsbad et de montagnes 
de Guadalupe. Il offre un programme d'études basé par 
ressource, des projets de la science, un manuel en ligne pour des 
professeurs, et une évaluation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">é um programa detalhado projetado realçar a 
ciência da High School, o math e a tecnologia estudam envolvendo 
estudantes em monitorar recursos naturais em parques nacionais das 
cavernas de Carlsbad e das montanhas de Guadalupe. Oferece um 
curriculum baseado recurso, projetos da ciência, um manual em linha 
para professores, e uma avaliação.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">è un programma globale destinato per aumentare la
scienza della High School, il per la matematica e la tecnologia studia
facendo partecipare gli allievi nel controllo delle risorse naturali 
nei parchi nazionali delle spelonche di Carlsbad e delle montagne di 
Guadalupe. Offre un programma di studi basato risorsa, i 
progetti di scienza, un manuale in linea per gli insegnanti e una 
valutazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">είναι ένα σημαντικό πρόγραμμα με σκοπό να ενισχύσει 
την επιστήμη γυμνασίου, math και τις μελέτες τεχνολογίας με την
ανάμειξη των σπουδαστών στον έλεγχο των φυσικών στοιχείων 
συμπεριφοράς στα εθνικά πάρκα σπηλαίων Carlsbad και 
guadalupe βουνών. Προσφέρει ένα resource-based 
πρόγραμμα σπουδών, τα προγράμματα επιστήμης, ένα σε απευθείας 
σύνδεση εγχειρίδιο για τους δασκάλους, και μια αξιολόγηση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">es un programa comprensivo diseñado para realzar 
ciencia de la High School secundaria, la matemáticas y la tecnología
estudia implicando a estudiantes en vigilar recursos naturales en 
parques nacionales de las cavernas de Carlsbad y de las montañas de 
Guadalupe. Ofrece un plan de estudios basado recurso, proyectos 
de la ciencia, un manual en línea para los profesores, y una 
evaluación.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206293</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106168</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/the-chihuahuan-desert-lab-on-line-manual</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
